title: Strava heatmaps expand up into 3D, giving a whole new ride perspective!
content:
Strava gives premium users another way to look back at their favorite riding spots with new 3D heatmaps. Overlaying all of your activity data over the terrain & aerial photo layers Strava already let you pick from, their new 3D Terrain Mode option for Personal Heatmaps gives users a new perspective on past rides and [â€¦]

The post Strava heatmaps expand up into 3D, giving a whole new ride perspective! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
